name: Stuffed French Toast
ingredients: 16 sturdy slices of white bread (homemade or french) 1 tsp. cinnamon
1 c. half and half 1 18 ounce jar of Smuckers apricot jam
1 8 oz. whipped Cream cheese ½ c. orange juice
steps: Spread whipped cream on eight slices of bread making 8 sandwiches. Cover with wax paper and
refrigerate overnight. When ready to fry dip sandwiches in mixture of eggs, half and half , cinnamon,
and vanilla. Grill on hot grill using non-­‐stick spray.
Sauce: Heat apricot jam with orange juice. Bring to a boil and stir until smooth. Serve with sauce and
